posts.message: Storing password in plain text, you’re doing it wrong
posts.caption: www.emadmokhtar.com
posts.description: If you’re software developer then there is big chance you’ll implement user login feature, and you must store the username and password in your system. Most of developers stored these precious information in database as plain text, yes we did include myself I was doing it wrong, and if you’re doing…
